title: Hi, just an idea.
body: With the middle scarab thing that grants vision after killing it countless times I've walked through it thinking it was mine which made their botlane see me and my gank failing. Can you please make it more evident as to who killed it? The amount of times I've lost kills to this is too many ):

replies.body: Run in the middle and just spam taunt, if they come at you it's not yours. Works 100% of the time.
Just look for the color on the ground. It is *NOT* a trivial task to do if you want to be a competent jungler x.x
Its Officer Caitlyn. He is probably reading this and shouting "AHA! IT WAS A GR8 B8 M8!!!!!!11!1!"
i am serious lol i can never tell who killed it
